title: How Justin Trudeau's Handgun Ban PROVES American Exceptionalism!
description:
Contrary to what the media says, the Uvalde shooting is a red flag AGAINST gun control. We'll explain why and walk you through the timeline of incompetence. Justin Trudeau is also calling for a ban on all handguns. And Nancy Pelosi's husband drinks too much, but can you blame him? #JustinTrudeau #Uvalde #Handguns
